links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime-generating Polynomial.
mathematica: lst={};Do[p=2*n^2+11;If[PrimeQ[p],AppendTo[lst,p]],{n,0,3*5!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 28 2009 *)Select[2Range[0,100]^2+11,PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 20 2011 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [a: n in [0..100] | IsPrime(a) where a is 2*n^2+11]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 08 2011
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
